response.explain: The error message indicates that the 'unfreeze' function is not defined. This is because there is no 'unfreeze' function in the provided action list. The correct function to use in this case is 'heat', which can be used to heat up the pie after it has been frozen.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the pie out of the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the oven.
(6) Open the oven.
(7) Put the pie in the oven.
(8) Close the oven.
(9) Heat the pie.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):

    heat(robot, pie)
